[source, js]
----
const response = await client.search({
  index: "sales",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    constant_score: {
      filter: {
        range: {
          price: {
            to: "500",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    prices: {
      histogram: {
        field: "price",
        interval: 50,
        hard_bounds: {
          min: 100,
          max: 200,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
----
